1770824030020.oldValue:
@mediaMobile{ 
	width: "100%",
	backgroundColor: "#FFF",
	borderRadius: 20,
	alignItems: "center",
	justifyContent: "center",
	shadowColor: '#000',
  shadowOffset: { width: 0, height: 4 },
  shadowOpacity: 0.2,
  shadowRadius: 20,
	borderTopLeftRadius: 20,
  borderTopRightRadius: 20,
	overflow: "hidden"
}
@mediaDesktop{ 
	width: 400,
	height: 450,
	backgroundColor: "#FFF",
	borderRadius: 20,
	alignItems: "center",
	justifyContent: "center",
	shadowColor: '#000',
  shadowOffset: { width: 0, height: 4 },
  shadowOpacity: 0.2,
  shadowRadius: 20,
	borderTopLeftRadius: 20,
  borderTopRightRadius: 20,
	overflow: "hidden"
}
